data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Lycodon (Boie, 1826) from the southwestern mountains of China (Squamata: Colubridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vogel, Gernot, Luo, Jian (2011): A new species of the genus Lycodon (Boie, 1826) from the southwestern mountains of China (Squamata: Colubridae). Zootaxa 2807: 29-40, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202515
